scripts.tailwind-start: yarn tailwind build -o src/stylesheets/tailwind.generated.css && osascript -e 'display notification "Tailwind development build ready" with title "yarn tailwind-start"'
scripts.build: yarn tailwind-build && yarn react-scripts build && osascript -e 'display notification "Production build ready" with title "yarn build"' && yarn tailwind-start && osascript -e 'display notification "Development build ready" with title "yarn start"'
